mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 CAST(CAST(COL001 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL001, CAST(CAST(COL002 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL002 , CAST(CAST(COL003 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL003, CAST(CAST(COL004 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL004 , CAST(CAST(COL005 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL005, CAST(CAST(COL006 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL006 , CAST(CAST(COL007 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL007, CAST(CAST(COL008 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL008 , CAST(CAST(COL009 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL009, CAST(CAST(COL010 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL010 , CAST(CAST(COL011 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL011, CAST(CAST(COL012 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL012 , CAST(CAST(COL013 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL013, CAST(CAST(COL014 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL014 , CAST(CAST(COL015 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL015, CAST(CAST(COL016 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL016 , CAST(CAST(COL017 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL017, CAST(CAST(COL018 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL018 , CAST(CAST(COL033 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL033, CAST(CAST(COL034 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL034 , CAST(CAST(COL035 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL035, CAST(CAST(COL036 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL036 , CAST(CAST(COL037 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL037, CAST(CAST(COL065 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL065, CAST(CAST(COL066 AS NUMERIC(8,1)) AS VARCHAR) AS COL066 FROM ${selectTable} ORDER BY LOGTIME DESC
